project.name: Helios Datalake
project.scope: Unified ELT to Snowflake, dbt modeling, Kafka ingestion

sections.title: Introduction & Role Context
sections.goal: Establish interviewee's background, alignment with company mission and values, and familiarity with Helios Datalake scope.
sample_questions: Can you briefly describe your experience with ELT pipelines and how it relates to our Helios Datalake project?
How do you typically ensure data model quality and consistency in a regulated industry?
Which parts of our mission and values resonate most with your work style?

sections.title: Technical Deep Dive: ELT and dbt Modeling
sections.goal: Assess technical proficiency in designing and operating ELT pipelines, dbt transformations, and integration with Kafka ingestion.
sample_questions: Walk me through how you would design a dbt model for a new regulated dataset, including lineage tracking.
How would you handle late-arriving data in Kafka ingestion for Helios?
Can you give an example of applying a runbook like RB-ING-042 in a real-world failover scenario?

sections.title: SLA/SLO Management and Incident Handling
sections.goal: Evaluate understanding of SLA-HEL-01 and how to meet availability targets under operational stress.
sample_questions: Given a 99.9% availability SLA, how do you prioritize incident response for ingestion delays?
What metrics would you monitor to ensure compliance with SLA-HEL-01?
How would you coordinate with the SRE team during a high-severity incident?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Explore awareness of dependencies between Helios Datalake and other Novereon projects (e.g., Borealis ETL, Nimbus Observability).
sample_questions: How would changes in Borealis ETL's CDC strategy (RFC-1711) impact Helios ingestion?
What observability signals from Nimbus would be most valuable to you?
Describe a scenario where you had to adjust Helios pipelines due to upstream schema evolution.

sections.title: Decision-Making, Tradeoffs, and Risk Management
sections.goal: Understand how the interviewee makes evidence-based decisions under uncertainty, balancing safety, performance, and compliance.
sample_questions: Can you share a time when you had to choose between faster delivery and stricter data validation?
How do you document and communicate tradeoffs to stakeholders?
If you identified a risk that could jeopardize the BLAST_RADIUS containment, what steps would you take?

sections.title: Closing & Candidate Questions
sections.goal: Allow the candidate to ask questions, clarify expectations, and demonstrate engagement.
sample_questions: What questions do you have about our data platform roadmap?
Is there any aspect of the Helios Datalake architecture you'd like to explore further?
How do you see yourself contributing to sustainable velocity in our context?
